resources.string: The Chosen Voxxed Days has passed out.\nIf you want to check the archive of past event please pick the year.
Welcome to Voxxed Days of Thessaloniki
Welcome to Voxxed Days of Athens

The Voxxed Days of Thessaloniki is organized for two years in a row in the Thessaloniki.Thessaloniki has a number of great museums , status and sights with the most popular the White Tower.\nFor more information About Thessaloniki you can find at thessaloniki.com. From the menu on the left you can navigate to the applications features

The Voxxed Days of Athens is organized for two years in a row in the Athens.Athens has a number of great museums , status and sights with the most popular the Acropolis.\nFor more information About Athens you can find at Athens.com. From the menu on the left you can navigate to the applications features.
